thread.title: IDBI Bank launches self service of cheque dispensation
thread.title_full: IDBI Bank launches self service of cheque dispensation

title: IDBI Bank launches self service of cheque dispensation
text: IDBI Bank launched its first self service Mini Branch Kiosk at its Cuffe Parade, Mumbai Branch which will address the customer's request of personalized cheque leaves dispensation and issue of Demand Draft & Pay Order on 24X7 basis. Many public sector bank are actively tapping technology to reach out to the customers. Some banks have also launched kiosks for updating pass books besides cash dispensation.
